addons.name: Firefox Hello Beta
addons.description: The latest beta test version of Firefox Hello
addons.fullDescription:
Firefox Hello is looking at addressing user needs via web sharing in Firefox.

This add-on is the latest version of the current in-development work that is released before the Firefox Hello is updated in Firefox.

Install it only if you want to help test the newest changes - if you want the stable version, you don't need to do anything - its already in Firefox.

addons.name: Adblock Plus
addons.description:
Blocks annoying video ads on YouTube, Facebook ads, banners and much more.

Adblock Plus blocks all annoying ads, and supports websites by not blocking unobtrusive ads by default (configurable).
addons.fullDescription:
Adblock Plus allows you to regain control of the internet and view the web the way you want to. The add-on is supported by over forty filter subscriptions in dozens of languages which automatically configure it for purposes ranging from removing online advertising to blocking all known malware domains. Adblock Plus also allows you to customize your filters with the assistance of a variety of useful features, including a context option for images, a block tab for Flash and Java objects, and a list of blockable items to remove scripts and stylesheets.

Starting with Adblock Plus 2.0 there is an option in Filter Preferences to allow some non-intrusive advertising. The goal is to support websites using non-intrusive ways to advertise and to encourage more websites to do the same. Read more

screenshots.caption: Easily remove all annoying ads from Firefox.
Adblock Plus can do more than adblocking. Enable powerful features in one click.
Clean up your Facebook experience with Adblock Plus.
Adblock Plus even removes those annoying 30-second video ads on YouTube.
Browse the web as it once used to be.
Please help us by reporting bugs.
You can even create your own blocking lists to customize the web to your exact needs.

addons.name: Ghostery
addons.description: Enjoy a faster, safer and cleaner browsing experience.
addons.fullDescription:
We live in a connected world. When you browse the web, your data leaves a digital footprint. This footprint, connected by tracking technologies (called trackers), helps companies build a profile about you and how you interact with their sites and their competitors, allowing them to optimize their communications and site experience to reach you - and others like you - at the right place, at the right time.

Ghostery gives you the control to make informed decisions about the personal data you share with the trackers on the sites you visit.

Enjoy a faster web
Some sites take too long to load. This can be due to trackers weighing your system down. Ghostery allows you to block the offending trackers and significantly speed up your browsing.

Get the content you want
Remove page clutter so you can focus on the content you want.

Control your data
Sometimes being connected can help you find the data you need quicker, like a location tracker that helps you find the closest cafe. Sometimes it spoils the fun, like a remarketing tracker, revealing the birthday present you wanted kept a surprise. Ghostery makes locking down your data easier.

Be Informed, Take Control
Ghostery gives you the tools needed to understand the different types of trackers and how they may impact your overall browsing experience, putting the power directly in your hands.

Connect and Learn More
How does Ghostery make money: https://www.ghostery.com/en/faq/how-does-ghostery-make-money-from-the-add-on/
Blog: https://www.ghostery.com/en/intelligence/category/consumer-blog/
FAQ: https://www.ghostery.com/en/faq/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ghostery
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ghostery
Support: https://www.ghostery.com/support

screenshots.caption: Pop-up box shows you the list of trackers on each site you visit.
Get a high level of control over your browsing experience from the Dashboard.  View the different categories the trackers belong to, trust or restrict all trackers on a site with one click.
Block or allow all trackers by category on either just the site viewed or all sites.
Trust or restrict all trackers with one click.
View all the trackers in a category and block or allow as needed.
